comments.creator: dbuchner@mozilla.com
comments.text: Since approximately a day or two after the December 20th launch of Firefox 9, Aurora and Nightly builds have suffered from a large, vertical back bar appearing on the right side of all chrome windows (including panels and pop-ups). I have observed this exclusively on Windows 7, and other operating systems seem unaffected, please advise.
comments.author: dbuchner@mozilla.com
